reasons_to_visit.details: March marks the beginning of spring with longer days and gradually warming temperatures.
Traditional Easter markets begin appearing in Old Town Square with local crafts and seasonal treats.
Tourist numbers start increasing but remain manageable, offering a good balance of atmosphere and accessibility.
Spring cultural events and festivals begin, offering diverse entertainment options.

reasons_to_avoid.details: March weather can be variable with sudden changes between winter and spring conditions.
Snow melt and spring rains can create muddy conditions in parks and outdoor areas.
